Tip16: Tip: Try changing the different lighting modes in the pause menu!
Tip17: Tip: Press '$keybind_hideUI' to hide the user interface
Tip18: Tip: Press '$keybind_screenshot' to take a screenshot!
Tip19: Tip: Press '$keybind_debugInfo' to look at debugging information
Tip20: Tip: Press '$keybind_dropItem' to drop the current item!
Tip21: Tip: Press '$keybind_openInventory' to open the inventory!
Tip22: Tip: Sprint against a wall to 'wall run', going farther than you would only by jumping.
